name: Hendrix: Visual Novel
description:
Description

In a descent into madness, the player wakes up to a surreal nightmare at the Hendrix Asylum. Something has gone terribly wrong and the player must question his own sanity to try to survive. Not knowing who to trust, the player hears various testimonies from the eccentric personalities roaming the asylum to try and piece together the story. With an original soundtrack and a Tim Burton-esque aesthetic, Hendrix is an eerie and captivating Visual Novel that completely immerses the player.

Features

> Original Soundtrack
> Multiple Endings
> Choice Mechanics
> Story-Driven Gameplay
> Text Based Adventure
